Paying Children education fee

All together we can help to sponsor a child the basic education so that we can help each other and help ourselves to shape the nation.

by Pyaribai Girdharilal Ranka Foundation

₹ 6842

Goal
₹ 0

Funded
24

Days Left
{/*model*/}
Your current plan is 1

You can donate more


  • Campaign Story
  • Comments

              India is a developing nation and we still have about 33 million children who do not have access to proper education. In the need of the hour, we need to support child education so that these people have access to the basic right of education to become wonderful beings. Sponsoring the children's education will not only help the children to fulfill their dreams but also contribute towards the success of our nation.

      1INR has taken up the initiative to educate such people so that they are able to stand on their feet as well as sustain for themselves. There are many students who refuse to go to school simply because their parents cannot afford to provide them quality education. Therefore we as humans can help to sponsor a child basic education so that we can help each other and help ourselves to shape the nation.

      We as a developing nation need to help each other by supporting these noble causes. To care and help each other is the sole purpose of one-nation and helping humanity. So we are at 1INR are doing our best to support the cause and help each other. By doing this you are helping a child put a smile on his face.
